name: WooCommerce to ActiveCampaign by WPOP
author: WPoperation

sections.description:
WooCommerce to ActiveCampaign is developed as addon of WooCommerce, helps to extend your subscription lists and collect unlimited leads .You can easily add your customers details in ActiveCampaign when checkout order is placed.

Features

  • Adds subscription in “ActiveCampaign” through “WooCommerce”
  • Option to select “ActiveCampaign” list ID for subscribers
  • Option to select “WooCommerce” checkout fields for “ActiveCampaign” list
  • Provide an opt-in checkbox on your checkout form for customers to opt-in to marketing
  • Configure what the opt-in checkbox says and if it’s checked by default
  • Constant updates
  • Free 24×7 support
sections.installation:
1. Unzip ecommerce-activecampaign.zip
  2. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/ecommerce-activecampaign
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. For customizing the plugin’s settings, you will get Woo ActiveCampaign Tab under WooCommerce
sections.faq:
Is WooCommerce Required?

Yes

What does this plugin do?

This plugin adds feature to “WooCommerce” to add subscription in “ActiveCampaign”

How to generate Active Campaign API credentials?

You can follow this link
https://help.activecampaign.com/hc/en-us/articles/207317590-Getting-started-with-the-API
